extension.summary: Smart intro/outro detection and skipping for TV shows
extension.description: This add-on automatically detects and remembers intro/outro times for TV shows. Features include: - Automatic show and episode detection - Saves intro/outro times for future playback - Multiple detection methods: chapter markers, user input, and more - Configurable skip settings and database options
extension.news: v1.3.0 - Added database for storing show times, multiple detection methods including user input, improved settings, and better chapter handling. Added show-level defaults and duration-based skipping.
